name: Goal, Motivation, Conflict
description: Each character should have one internally and externally

attributes.name: External Goal
attributes.description: Describe the physical outcome the character wants or needs to achieve (e.g. play professional sports)

attributes.name: External Motivation
attributes.description: Describe the outside force driving the character toward their goal (e.g. fame and fortune)

attributes.name: External Conflict
attributes.description: Describe the obstacle preventing the character from achieving their goal (e.g. competition)

attributes.name: Internal Goal
attributes.description: Describe the emotional outcome the character wants or needs to achieve (e.g. finding love)

attributes.name: Internal Motivation
attributes.description: Describe the inner force or emotion that drives the character toward their goal (e.g. loneliness)

attributes.name: Internal Conflict
attributes.description: Describe what stands in the character's way of achieving their inner goal (e.g. fear of failure)
